meanings.definition: A person who sells goods or services in an outstandingly successful manner.
meanings.sent1: The superseller at the market always has a crowd around their stall.
meanings.sent2: The new phone model became a superseller within days of its release.
meanings.sent3: The superseller at the flea market could even sell ice to an Eskimo!
meanings.sent4: Her charm and persuasion turned her into a superseller overnight.
meanings.sent5: The superseller's smile was as bright as the sun, attracting customers from afar.

meanings.definition: An item or product that sells exceptionally well.
meanings.sent1: The latest video game release was a superseller, flying off the shelves.
meanings.sent2: The superseller of the season was the trendy smartwatch.
meanings.sent3: The superseller toy was so popular that even adults wanted to play with it.
meanings.sent4: The superseller dress made everyone look like a fashion icon.
meanings.sent5: The superseller fragrance filled the room with a delightful scent.
